website_summaries.verdict: A potent whey isolate protein powder that tastes great and goes down smooth.
pros: 25 grams of protein for each serving
Rich, creamy texture that goes down smooth
Pleasant flavor that isn't too sweet
Helps build muscle and curb appetite

customer_reviews.title: Advertised Nutritional Content DOES NOT Match Actual
customer_reviews.text: I ordered strawberries and cream previously and I like it. This time I ordered Dutch Chocolate. As I am assuming several here are, I am on the ketogenic diet. This means carb usage is at a premium. When I looked at the advertised nutritional content, it said 1 carb, and then 1 fiber, which is really 0 carbs as the fiber cancels it out. However, when I got the container, it does NOT match what was advertised. It shows each serving as 3 carbs with 1 fiber; a net of 2 carbs. This is not extreme, but still does not match what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed!
customer_reviews.text: I wanna say thank you very much for not even sealing the product!! I got it, went to remove it and the lid slid right off and powder went everywhere! I am not even feeling comfortable using it since its unsealed. What a joke, not to mention the waste of powder and money. I always buy isopure, and love it. I'm so very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ON AMAZON, FAKE ISOPURE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after seeing a recipe for a Keto Fat bomb. Comes out chalky and sticky like wax, I thought I did it wrong and tried correctly, and even trying as a drink it comes out chalky and nasty. I took to a store where they had REAL Isopure and considering the label and the product this was confirmed FAKE! DO NO BUY THIS PRODUCT ON AMAZON!!! Who knows what else they are trying to put in there to make up for this fake product if you buying this for health reasons!
customer_reviews.author: Rob R

customer_reviews.title: The way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I am a middle aged woman needing to lose weight. I am allergic to nuts. I did my research and tried this product. I mix it with coconut milk and 1/2 banana every morning. I have lost 26 pounds in 10 weeks. This keeps my energy and nutrient levels up and makes it easy to a tay on target. I tried the creamy vanilla and didn't care for it. The Dutch chocolate does the trick and I am not tired of it. This is the choice to make!
customer_reviews.author: CindyLou Whoiswayover 2

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am really picky when it comes to flavors, texture, and just all around taste. I’ve probably spent a good thousand dollars on different brands of protein powders and hated all of them. This one, is different. I bought the Cookies n Cream. As soon as I opened it, it smelled absolutely amazing. It didn’t have that “I’m a protein powder” fake, sugary smell. This smelled legit like cookies. The taste is just as good. Not overly sweet, and great when mixed with Almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt the FDA require a seal?
customer_reviews.text: I opened the bottle and there was absolutely no plastic seal. I thought the FDA required a seal. Tell me if I'm wrong and if I'm correct please send me a sealed replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Prchal

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty!  Best I've had.
customer_reviews.text: I see now why ketoconnect.net uses this a lot. It is so good. I put it in my BPC this morning because I'm having a hard time getting enough protein on the keto WOE. 1 scoop, 25 g protein. I put it in just 1 cup of coffee with a scoop of MCT powder and it was very good! The price is surprisingly good too! On subscribe & save it was $14.62 for a pound. Long live the developers.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Brauer

customer_reviews.title: So far I have to say this is the best powder I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: So far I have to say this is the best powder I have ever tried. It is flavorful and creamy and mixes well. I mix it with another brands caffeinated peanut butter powder and milk and it’s so good. I have been super anxious to make my shakes lately because of it. :) I can’t wait to try other flavors and combos. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Kera B

customer_reviews.title: Choose the right flavor
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the Mint chocolate Chip flavor and it was undrinkable. Tasted like nasty dirt and I couldn’t even finish the first sip. Whatever you do don’t order this flavor! Decided to give it another try and test out the Coffee flavor. I am absolutely in love with this protein powder and drink it every morning after my workout! It taste more like a Starbucks cold late you would buy at the store compared to coffee but delicious non-the-less. I mix it with 6 Oz of almond milk instead of water and it taste even better!
customer_reviews.author: BritnieHope

customer_reviews.title: Warning!  Clumpy, Chewy Protein Drink???
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this. There was no seal under the cap. I thought that was odd, but this was the first time I purchased this product. I attempted to mix it well, but it was really clumpy. I tried to drink it... never had to chew a protein drink before. At this point I decided to check previous reviews. I think there is something wrong with this product and I am not sure if this is counterfeit or not, but I dumped out the rest and I won't drink any more or order any more!
customer_reviews.author: Paula F.

customer_reviews.title: Delish and filling
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't taste grainy because it fully dissolves in my soy milk unlike some other protein powders. I got the cookies & cream flavor and I think it tastes great! I'll definitely buying again and trying some other flavors. I use it as a meal replacement drink for dinner and it's filling. I haven't had any adverse side-effects like bloating or gas like some other powders I've used before either. My sugar levels stay normal when I check my blood sugar in the morning after using this the night before. All in all I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best form of WHEY from the best company!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best WHEY protein I've had until now. I've been working out since a very long time and I've tried my share of protein powders and brands. By far this is the blending, and the best form of whey (the ISOLATES) in a single powder. Also, since this being ISOPURE powder, it's best suited for lactose intolerant individuals like me. If you want to compare this head-to-head with another powder, Dynamatize IsoPURE 100 would be a similar option. Dynamatize taste better to Nature's Best but I've seen more gains with Nature's Best than the latter.
customer_reviews.author: Subhash H J

customer_reviews.title: Easily blended and tastes pretty good (see flavors at end of review)
customer_reviews.text: I initially tried Isopure a few years back because I was on an Atkins diet and this was low carb. i love the flavor of this. I've only ever tried chocolate and vanilla (and now I have the choco peanut butter). I enjoy this one so much, not grainy or too thick when mixed right, always a joy to drink and easy to blend with a blender bottle. 25 grams of protein, low carb count and i enjoy the taste. Update: Colombian Coffee (doesn't really taste like coffee at all) Vanilla (good base for mixes with fruits and what not) Choco Peanut butter (one of my fav. flavors. Really tastes like choco and pb) Chocolate (good flavor. No aftertaste)
customer_reviews.author: AyenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix. Great tasting. Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A great tasting protein drink is an oxymoron. Not so with this product, I was surprised it tasted better than all the other brands I've tried. It also mixed relatively well and fast. 60 seconds compared to 3 minutes with other brands. You may have clumps that settle to the bottom. No fret, just add an ounce of water or two and remix it and drink. Tastes almost like chocolate water, yay. Other brands taste like cardboard or gives you diarrhea, not Isopure. *knock on wood* I think pricing is good. Now only if I have the discipline to take this everyday not once a week or so :/
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Great for low carb diets!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a whey protein that wouldn't upset my stomach and this one did the trick! After trying a few brands and noticing they all caused me discomfort (gas) I discovered Isopure and it was love at first taste. No gas, bloating or aftertaste. Mixes well and is super low carb. The banana cream is my favorite but the Dutch chocolate is a close second.
customer_reviews.author: Outlaw Starwind

customer_reviews.title: The worst protein I’ve ever tasted!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I am so very disappointed. After reading reviews and others saying they like the taste I cannot drink this. I ordered the cookies and cream and something is wrong with it. My husband who will eat everything will not even drink this. I mixed with water, regular milk and almond milk, none of which were tolerable. I usually drink Hexapro or Level-1 by Suppliment Supetstore but was looking for a protein with fewer Calories to lean out a bit. Very disappointed and not sure how to return to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor. Low calories, high protein.
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Isopure when I'm trying to shred some weight but still get a nice muscle tone. Low calories, no carbs, high protein, exactly what I need. As far as protein shakes go, the chocolate flavor is my favorite so far with this brand. I had the vanilla recently and didn't like it at all. The powder for this is is really fine, so it mixes very well with a simple protein shaker. Not clumpy at all. I usually use it for post workouts, but I will also use it for meal replacements sometimes, mainly for breakfast or lunch. Overall I'm very satisfied with Isopure.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: gives me headache - too much zinc
customer_reviews.text: Although I like the coffee taste, albeit a bit salty, this whey isolate gives me pronounced headaches. The label shows very high amount of vitamins and minerals - two scoops give you the full daily dose of those and I use about 4 scoops per day. I get headaches from Zinc even at daily amount doses so that is most probable reason. Unfortunately I had to return and got a pea protein isolate without any additives - I add sucralose and cocoa powder and no headaches at all.
customer_reviews.author: smallphi

customer_reviews.title: Something is Wrong, Counterfit Powder or Major Change in Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this exact same product for years, 33 orders according to Amazon, in the Dutch Chocolate flavor. it has always been excellent until my last few orders. The flavor is now chalky and tastes down right bad. I don't feel safe drinking it. This first occurred with an order I placed on August 17, 2020. I returned that order thinking it was a fluke. The next order I placed on August 30, 2020 had the same issue. I don't know what is going on, but something is not right.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ingmanson

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE FAKE - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product has the WRONG label, made by the WRONG company (nature’s best?), has the WRONG nutritional facts that includes “energy”? This has got to be the biggest joke of all time. Ive been using isopure for years and this is NOT isopure. OH best part is I need to take time out of my life to return this trash to get my money back. DO. NOT .BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great for keto diet and low carb diet
customer_reviews.text: This Colombian Coffee protein powder is amazing and tastes yummy!! It’s great for keto diet and low carb diet. I’m so glad I found this!! I drink it every morning or afternoon with unsweetened almond vanilla milk or unsweetened cashew milk. I’ve been waiting for seven other flavors to come back in stock so I can buy them. I hope they taste just as good or better. My weight was 150lbs, a week later 140 lbs. I should be at my goal weight of 130lbs -125lbs really soon thanks to isopure protein powder, Keto diet and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: The best protein powder!!
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin? This is by far the most delicious protein shake I've had, and I've tried A LOT. Literally tastes like a chocolate milkshake! Also, amazing ingredients and macros. Fits perfectly into my "keto journey" and it's helping me get the gains I want. Win, win.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like $#/[
customer_reviews.text: I gambled and I lost. I love Isopure for the lack of carbs and I'd hoped this Mint flavor would be OK. It blends fine, and if the ingredients and label are true, it fills a need. However, the Mint Chocolate flavor is nasty. Sadly, it only came in the three pound container so I'll be choking this down for awhile. Maybe I'll mix it with tuna to up the flavor a little...
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the dutch chocolate protein powder for 5 years now. I take it after my morning workout. It tastes good enough to use with just plain water, but it's also great with milk or a milk substitute. The nutrition facts say a serving is two scoops (50g protein), but I use just one scoop (25g of protein) and the canister lasts twice as long. I got married a few months ago and my husband uses a different brand of protein, but I won't switch to his because I like the way mine tastes so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dutch chocolate is by far my fave!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple different brands and Dutch Chocolate by isopure had the best chocolate flavor, it was really good. I was a bit disappointed with Isopure's vanilla flavored protein powder since that one had a very strange, iron like, after taste, Soo im glad I finally found the one that works for me and taste good, if you haven't tried the dutch chocolate protein power, give it a try you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs protein and this is what you've been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my coffee every morning. I feel stronger, I'm dropping pounds every other day, it tastes great and my wife loves the results so much that she bought a vanilla version and drinks it everyday in her coffee. I do in italian roast with a scoop of this and a hazelnut cream sugar and fat-free preferably and it is Magic. Sometimes on the weekends I add a shot of bourbon and the flavor is incredible. My recommendation is try a powder and see what you can apply it to. Make the recipe your own and improve. I forgot the customer service were pleasant. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Upsets my stomach!
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended to me by my gym for being a higher quality protein powder. Unfortunately, it makes me feel really sick to my stomach and bloated. I've tried other brands and never had this issue. It doesn't taste good either. My partner who drinks all kinds of gross meal shakes to pack in calories and protein won't even touch it. I wish I tried it first because now I'm stuck with a tub of it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dee

customer_reviews.title: Low carb content, not a great taste.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to buy this product. I bought the chocolate and vanilla flavors. I really like the ingredients and the nutritional value such as the low carb content. However, taste is somehow unusual. The flavor is neither sweet nor salty, is somewhere in the middle and I do not taste a considerable difference between chocolate and vanilla. Flavor wise, I am a little bit disappointed, especially when you take into account the cost. I should have bought one tub instead of two. I will opt for a different isolate protein powder next time.
customer_reviews.author: Benito

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand since the start of my wellness journey and have always been pleasantly surprised by the taste, but this time I was disappointed. Despite the taste being displeasing to my pallet, the blending consistency was better than the other flavors I’ve purchased, it complemented additional supplements well, and it was not chalky. For me it was the flavor and smell, just wasn’t a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Carter M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Blends well. Good taste
customer_reviews.text: I like this protein powder because it blends well. It has a good taste that I don’t get sick of. I have been using this for 6 months. It helps me hit my protein goal easier. It is not a good idea to add this to your hot coffee just because it says coffee on the box. I tried it (read a blog and believed them), it failed. The protein became “cooked” and it tasted nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try a new protein powder, especially a low carb one. I usually mix my protein with almond milk and have no issues drinking like it’s chocolate milk. This didn’t mix well at all. The flavor was so bad, I dumped the shake down the drain. Would definitely not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with this product. Purchased the columbian coffee and true to review add a lil heavy whip cream and you wont be disappointed. I didnt even have problems when it chunked. I sometimes get a chance to put in blender with ice but most mornings its in my shaker with cold water & cream. It was easy to palate and i can sip all morning. I will try the others when this one is gone. just surprised it satisfied my coffee taste and got me through my morning.
customer_reviews.author: Tyjere67

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Due to some reviews I decided to buy a smaller size to make sure the flavor was ok... now I regret not buying the bigger size because its so good! Seriously has become my new breakfast staple. I don't have time most mornings to make breakfast before work but needed to find something who k, easy, and low carb...this is it! I also bought the big version of vanilla, which is good too, but cookies and cream is definetly my favorite. Reminds me if a healthier, better tasting version if when I used to buy McDonald's cookie frappe... which Lord knows was probably so unhealthy.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingrlygrl

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is great!
customer_reviews.text: Coffee flavor is really good! Better than vanilla and chocolate in my opinion, and my boyfriend agrees. If you are new to whey isolate protein powder, do not expect this to actually taste like a coffee drink, you're not going to be fooled- but seriously for a carb free, fat free protein shake, it's really good! *I will note that looking at the ingredients, you could totally make your own as it is just their unflavored whey isolate, instant columbian coffee, and sucralose.*
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Decent taste, packaging definitely needs work, high price point IMO
customer_reviews.text: What I like/love: It is low carb and I don’t feel bloated gassy or sick from this powder. Meh: the flavor is good borderline acceptable. The sweetener they use doesn’t really appear initially but the chocolate comes through which is nice. I don’t recommend the vanilla as it tastes like infant formula. Cons: it doesn’t mix super well without a blender bottle. The packaging is not very secure because they don’t put a seal under the lid, only flimsy plastic wrap you pray holds the lid on. The cost is high, hoping this protein is as high quality as it claims...
customer_reviews.author: JJeaneRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, otherwise normal protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say this tastes exactly like cookies and cream, but it does taste good. It kind of tastes like powdered creamer and has the same texture. As with most protein powders, you're not going to be able to stir this directly into cold liquid and have it completely combine. If you don't like the movie Dune being in your drink, the blender or protein shaker/whisk are your friend. If you're mixing it in with something hot, it's a lot easier and less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: but afraid I would not like the flavor and would be stuck with it
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to brand for protein powder, and my go to flavor was Dutch Chocolate. After a few canisters I was ready for something new, but afraid I would not like the flavor and would be stuck with it. I took a shot and tried the Columbina Coffee and it's pretty freaking delicious. It has a mild iced coffee with creamer flavor, I only mixed it with water. And I'm hoping the caffein helps me get away from purchasing coffee everyday
customer_reviews.author: MustLoveDogsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: love this exact flavor. Love isopure
customer_reviews.text: Flavor tastes great! I love isopure. It blends amazingly well (I use water as my base). 25 grams of protein for each scoop with a lot of other good stuff. The Choco Peanut butter flavor is one of the best. I sincerely love it because it doesn't have a weird taste (taste exactly as described), it has no aftertaste, easy to drink, smooth and has the protein count to boot.
customer_reviews.author: AyenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buying again
customer_reviews.text: Harder to blend with milk but it’s lactose free so i’m not even sure if i should use milk. Thought the taste would have more of a likeness to cookies and cream but it’s more like vanilla mixed with chocolate. The effects are nice and it does help with appetite and the low carb really helps with trimming results
customer_reviews.author: RealReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for anyone living the KETO Lifestyle!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I live a KETO lifestyle and use all the flavors of Isopure. Banana makes great banana nut muffins when mixed with Almond flour. Strawberry makes fantastic Strawberry Angel Food Cake - soooo good. I like to just drink the Chocolate - it is great for those cravings. Vanilla is good when you just want something sweet. All the flavors are zero carb. This is a great product and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Grace W.

customer_reviews.title: Cookies and Cream is Gross!
customer_reviews.text: This one was disappointing for me; I absolutely LOVE the Dutch Chocolate flavor, I figured I'd mix it up and order the cookies and cream flavor thinking that it would be just as good. WRONG!! upon opening it you get punched in the face with the heavy whey smell, the taste is just the same... Very heavy whey tasting; I don't hardly taste any cookies and cream flavoring. Even mixing in some sugar free chocolate syrup couldn't mask the taste. Yuck! The only bonus is that it mixes very well as do all of the isopure proteins in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Overly sweet for sensitive tastebuds
customer_reviews.text: If you are sensitive to sweet then this is not for you. Overly sweet with Sucralose and leaves that fake sugar flavor in your mouth. 😐
customer_reviews.author: Ger'

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT SEEM GENUINE. STRANGE SOAP-LIKE RESIDUE
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this is genuine Isopure. The packaging is wrong for one and it's very bland. Not at all what im used to. It's also very soapy. Its hard to explain. After drinking, when you go to rinse your shaker, it bubbles up like soap. It does this 2 or three times before the shaker finally rinses. Given that I do not think this is genuine and the weird soap effect, I'm concerned about what I may have been ingesting.
customer_reviews.author: GreeneAquatics

customer_reviews.title: Imitation coffee is not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee, and was using this not only because of a referral, but because of the quality of ingredients. However, after awhile the imitation coffee that is found in this got disgusting and I could not even smell it without gagging. So sad because I still had about half of the container left..
customer_reviews.author: Noah B

customer_reviews.title: High protein /good value/ good for everyday fitness peeps
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price vs major store brands or same at retail. Protein content good. ok tasting..considering caloric content for overall diet. I mainly purchase this for my daughter who has been working out regularly and sticking 2 a healthy high protein diet. She works hard at improvement but we are not hard core body builders. She has lost 20 lbs since Oct 2016 by exercising and eating healthy but not unrealistic.
customer_reviews.author: wolfmama1012

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT NOT SEALED!
customer_reviews.text: The prodyuct is NOT SEALED!!! COMPLETELY OPEN...no plastic seal arou d the lid. You open the lid and there's no seal in there either. I had to return it....I dont trust it. It could be fake...what if theres something else in there? This is the second time I receive an isopure protein under these conditions. TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best protein powder I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I never felt compelled leave a product review on Amazon until I bought this protein powder. For years, I bought the cheapest possible protein powder and struggled with product quality as a result. Isopure is by far the best quality powder I’ve ever used. The product quality is superior; it mixes in water in five shakes or less and tastes delicious. Couple that with the fact that this product provides a lengthy list of vitamins and minerals, and you have, by far, the best protein powder available. Additionally, the label carries a stamp to ensure product authenticity, which seemed to be an issue in a number of product reviews.
customer_reviews.author: D S

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Sweet, gritty, chemical tasting, hurt my teeth and made me feel sick for about 2 hours after drinking it. Tried 1 time. Will probably throw the rest out. Bummed that I bought cookies n cream, dutch chocolate and creamy vanilla and they are all horrible. Tossing them all, unless I can find some fool to give them to....
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Moon

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder! I blend the chocolate protein powder with some frozen bananas, peanut butter, ice, and almond milk and its delicious! Fills me up so I can drink it for a meal or after a workout. I can mix this with water and it still taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha

customer_reviews.title: A Tablespoon in my coffee
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my coffee-1 T with 1 T All-in-One makes a nice drink. Sometimes I add a t of unflavored gelatin or half t of spice chocolate (dark chocolate powder, powdered tumeric, and powdered cinnamon in equal measure) or both for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Flavor isn’t Strong but Tastes Good And gets the Job done
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried all the flavors of this protein and so far cookies and cream, Tahini Vanilla, and Toasted Coconut taste the best. The flavors aren’t very strong - I tried the strawberry and cream and it barely tasted like anything. The cookies and cream is just enough to taste it but it’s not over powering. Overall, decent taste and decent price for a protein that has a lot of protein, vitamins, and minerals. I’ve been buying this protein now for almost a year, the 0 sugar 0 carbs is a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: user123

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is delicious. I typically do not like any protein powders but mixing this with 8 oz of cold water and boy do you have yourself a snack. or at least that's how it feels. I only take with one scoop as I am trying to lose weight and make sure I have my protein. The package is a little to be desired but I bought the 1 lb package and I am sure its cheaper to send it in a bad than a container. All is forgiven, I have plenty of left over containers at home and I will be purchasing the 3 lbs soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia DeCosta

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is strangely..... gross. Colombian coffee this is NOT
customer_reviews.text: Love Isopure protein powder. Hate this flavor. Nothing about it reminds me of colombian coffee, it tastes... weird. It still has awesome protein count but not worth the flavor. I couldnt wait to drink all so I can get a different flavor. Still easy to blend (like all Isopure protein powders) but tastes weird. Really weird. Also has a weird aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: AyenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Weird aftertaste. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed. We normally buy vanilla or Dutch chocolate but thought this flavor sounded good and wanted to try! Very unimpressed by the flavor. In fact, it’s kind of weird and leaves a bad aftertaste in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: The protien powder that doesn't *drink* like a protein powder--love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote another review on a larger size of this, if you're interested in my opinions. The takeaway: Great value, great quality worth it's price, easily drinkable and tasty, no disgusting "protein" flavor or graininess, wide variety of flavors. I tried the 1-pound pouch first to see if I'd like it before committing to larger containers of the stuff, or this brand. Was not disappointed. If you ever doubt a powder, purchase the smallest quantity at first, so you do regret wasting money too much if you don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Keto Friendly & Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Found this recommended in a few different places for keto-friendly diets. 50g of protein for only 1g of net carbs? Yes please! I have Dutch Chocolate currently, & use it to make a milkshake-type drink when everyone else in the house is enjoying ice cream. 2 scoops, 1 tbsp of heavy cream, 1 cup of ice, and 10oz of water (artificial sweetener if needed, but I don't think so), & a spoonful of peanut butter... Blend it all up & enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great (I like to mix it with Unsweetened almond milk) and blends smoothly. I use a electric vortex mixing cup and it works great (in my regularly shake it also works but not quiet as smooth) Having used a wide variety of protein, this is one of my go to brands for meeting my needs. It’s always nice to not have to choke down your supplements and actually be able to enjoy what your having.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N Saito

customer_reviews.title: Dutch Chocolate & Creamy Vanilla flavors
customer_reviews.text: I am still debating which flavor is better because both are versatile. I don't think ANY protein powder is gonna taste amazing. I've only tried a handful of brands and so far, these two flavos aren't horrible at all. It does the job and it didn't wanna make me gag after drinking it. I've tried both flavors mixed with water only and they tasted just fine. Neither one is overly sweet, either which is another plus! Both taste great with unsweetened coconut and/or unsweetened almond milk. Before writing this I decided I'd mix a scoop of Dutch Chocolate with 6oz. water, a small banana, and 1/4 cup of frozen blueberries. So good!
customer_reviews.author: MC1346

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it has a seal.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love this protein powder but this time around when received product the seal was broken well not sealed at all!! It’s like they recycled the container with different product claiming to be same one! Beware of what you order because this is not the same protein powder I’ve been using for almost a year now. Returning this one and Requesting a new one hopefully this one will be sealed and the correct product.
customer_reviews.author: DebSd

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! Fake product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a fake product. DO NOT BUY!!!! I had been getting nauseous every time I consume this product and was trying to pinpoint what it could be. After reading reviews, I went to GNC and bought the “same” exact product and what a difference. Only going to actual stores for this product moving forward. I’ve taken isopure for years and I can’t believe I didn’t notice the change right away. Who knows what I’ve been consuming in this product off Amazon for the last 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: melissa molina

customer_reviews.title: Great while on the keto diet!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite protein powder. We were looking for something that was low carb to drink on some mornings while doing the keto diet. I love the flavor, and it makes it easy to have a quick shake/smoothie without messing up my macros for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I am a low carb eater and have a low carb drink in the morning to start my day! I try new chocolate low carb protein drinks and this one is really low and tastes great! I will stick with this for now because it is great!
customer_reviews.author: P. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Recipe has changed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used isopure’s zero carb cookies and cream for over 2 years. This is the second time I’ve noticed a change in this recipe. The first being sometime last year but the taste was still relatively ok. Now the latest batch the taste and consistancing of powder and post mix has significantly. The taste has changed negatively and the texture of mixed drink is more granular. I feel that if you are to change the recipe of a product, you should let the consumer know. Customers should not be surprised with unannounced change.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Chan

customer_reviews.title: No chalky taste
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of adding to hot coffee...does not work. Clumps and is gross. Cold beverage only. No chalky taste.
customer_reviews.author: CarolO

customer_reviews.title: Like aspartame, including the delightful aftertaste...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several flavors of Isopure and all have been delicious, with the exception of espresso. It tastes a little like extremely watered down coffee, but the overwhelming flavor is artificial sweetener, and the aftertaste...Ugh! I’ve tried mixing with water, coffee, unsweetened cashew milk and even halving with the very yummy vanilla, but the artificial sweetener flavor manages to ruin even that. Isopure is great, and I won’t switch brands, but try any flavor but espresso.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sund

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting for the best price!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is honestly the best bang for your buck in terms of grams AND it tastes wayyyy better than its competitors. I've tried Gold Standard and the other brands you can find at the store and I hate them all. Isopure is creamy and it's not packed with a bunch of sugar. It's rather milky with just water or almond milk. I love the dutch chocolate and vanilla low carb versions! I drink a 3-5 shakes a week and this lasts me about a month maybe two. Be warned, the scoop is buried ALL the way at the bottom though so you'll have to dig a bit. It's a 70cc scoop.
customer_reviews.author: NJP

customer_reviews.title: Columbian Coffee didn't have an internal lid seal
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand before and there's usually has a paper seal on the inside of the lid, but alas not this time. Don't get me wrong, it did have the plastic outer seal and it tasted better than what I figured it would & it's hard to beat the $29 dollar price. Maybe it's the company phasing out this flavor? Who knows> Just something to take note on before hitting the buy button, but mine seamed fine and it was pretty enjoyable to drink
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: No Scoop Included
customer_reviews.text: Serving size: 2 scoops. Maybe they mean the concept of a scoop, because mine didn't have a scooper in it. Luckily I still had some of my MRE Lite left and used it's scoop, but that one was definitely smaller than Isopure's scoop (I used to use Isopure all the time, and their scoop size is fairly large compared to others). Because of that, I never got the right consistency and the flavor was only so-so. And listen, I know you have to dig for scoops sometimes. I was up to my elbow in the stuff: no scoop to be found. Basically, make sure you have a scooper handy just in case. And be prepared to guess.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This was the only brand that didn't irritate my stomach. The only con is that it doesn't dissolve well in very cold water. That's only a problem if you plan on mixing it with water, I just use room temperature water to mix it then put it in the fridge. The chocolate tastes just like chocolate. Been using this brand for years, I always repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Domonique

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to lunch
customer_reviews.text: I follow a low carb lifestyle and its REALLY hard to find a low-carb protein powder to drink when you're in a hurry and don't have time to cook a meal. I really love the flavor, is not as chocolaty as I thought it would be but with a cup of unsweetened almond milk and 1/2 cup of frozen berries is delicious! Definitely buying this monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: High quality ingredients and taste great too!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Dutch Chocolate Isopure Protein Powder for the last month or so. I have used a number of products over the years and this one just mixes effortlessly and tastes great. I was on a Keto diet for several months and this was a great option because it had zero net carbs and still packed 25 grams of protein. I drink a serving in the morning and usually after a workout and the muscle building and recovery is definitely noticeable. I will definitely purchase more in the near future, you just can’t go wrong with the high quality ingredients in this product.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Isopure Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of this quite a bit. And it mixes very well in my mini blender. I drink it with fruit mixed with plain yogurt or skim mlk. It is not over sweetened. It is a flavor i think will be enjoyed by most. It is enough different from Creamy Vanilla, which I also like, but it is just enough different to make it my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Depree

customer_reviews.title: Favorite protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Isopure for years in many of their flavors. It's one of the best "bang for your buck" powders as far as grams protein for calories. Minimal if any fat or carbs, and taste is great. I sometimes mix their banana and chocolate powders together and it tastes like a milkshake. helps keep me from eating ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to add protein into my diet without pumping up my blood sugar. I am really happy with this so far. It isn't heavy so it wouldn't be good for a meal replacement, but the flavor is good and it mixes easily in water or milk. It is pricey, but when you are diabetic, everything is. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Tingle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I heard great things about the flavor of this product (especially the cookies and cream flavor) but I found it to be almost inedible. The protein chalk taste was thick, even when watered down or I used milk. I really wanted to like this one bc of the macros but I couldnt ever finish a drink. I tried to mix it in to yogurt or baked goods but it just ruined what I added it to. I wish I hadn't gave it so many chances, so I could have returned it or tried a new flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Genaro Mapula

customer_reviews.title: One of the best flavors!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite Isopure flavors of all!! Not too sweet but enough to make it super yummy and flavorful with other spices in it!! I sometimes also add a little vanilla cream protein powder to make it even creamier quandary it’s just dessert!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good protein, mediocre taste.
customer_reviews.text: Mixes clean, great amount of protein and appreciate zero carbs. Taste is, well blah. Figured mint chip might be a nice change of pace but it's a little disappointing. Zero carbs and no fat, good for keto add some of your own good fats and something to boost the flavor and it's pretty good. Have subscribed to this so might try different flavors and see if better. Overall not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Leah A. Oatman

customer_reviews.title: Subscribed!
customer_reviews.text: Cookies and cream and vanilla are my go-to flavors. The ingredients are what makes me choose this protein out of all the others. Packed with BCAAS and other vitamins while also having a low calorie and 0 carb count to keep a low calorie diet in check. Great for fat loss. Mixes super easily. I drink it with 300ml of water and chug it. This is actually on my subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.author: Bea Zoleta

customer_reviews.title: Sucralose ruins this powder
customer_reviews.text: Sucralose ruins this powder. Strong aftertaste. It would taste fine without any sweetner. But, if someone needed to improve the taste, they already have a plan such as a couple drops of honey. It also has soy lecithin which for me causes intestinal problems. Once it's gone, I'm leaving this powder behind. If you want the healthiest and most natrual powder, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, calorie count, and overall product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am very busy in the morning, so it’s nice to fix a protein shake the night before. I’ve tried a lot of different protein shakes, and overall this one is great. The flavor, calories, and sugar is good. I already ordered a 3 pound container (got it at a great price as a deal of the day). I’m not that happy with the 1 pound price. I wish more flavors were available in the 1 pound package at a decent price, so I could try others.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Good Low Carb Option
customer_reviews.text: Very good as a filler meal. I have tried the vanilla (good), the banana cream (okay), and most recently the chocolate (best). They mix really well, especially if you have a blender ball. My ONLY complaint is that when mixed with water that is even slightly warm, they develop these weird clusters? But no issue with cold water, serves me right for playing mad scientist in the kitchen. Lol. Good stuff, I'll keep trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Authentic Isopure
customer_reviews.text: The bad reviews here have to be from Viramin Shoppe trolls... I have been using Isopure for 5 years. 3 years ago I discovered I could save 25-30% at Amazon. I purchase the product sold and delivered by Amazon. It has never come unsealed. The flavor is as it has always been.. excellent. It mixes smoothly... no clumps. The product I have received from Amazon the last 3 years is authentic Isopure which is an awesome product. Pay no attention to the Trolls. You can be confident in the product sold by Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Marty S. Lile

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Works well being used in various different ways from drinks to baking ingredient. The let down is the very weak flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Dan7678

customer_reviews.title: My protein go to. Delicious chocolate flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Isopure is an excellent source for replenishment to get in a solid workout the very next day. Tons of whey protein and vitamins here, highly recommended. I'm not a body builder or anything, just someome trying to get back in shape. This helps me push forward and the taste is yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: awesome low carb protein solution
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. My favorite way to drink it is to mix it with powdered peanut butter and unsweetened cashew or almond milk. If you mix it well, it doesn't have that weird grainy texture that some protein powders have. I love that this is low carb and you get a lot of protein for the calories as well. I generally do half a serving size (1 scoop) and the 25 grams of protein is perfect for me for a light meal replacement or a post-workout protein boost. I haven't tried the other flavors Isopure offers because I love this one so much, but I hope to soon!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Horrible after taste
customer_reviews.text: I use protein daily. I have a few favorites. I thought I'd try something new. I bought the cookies and cream. Most companies have come a long way over the years with taste and texture. This has a lot of room for improvement. The after taste is nasty and then I kept burping it up hours later. It literally left me nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: Maine

customer_reviews.title: Too salty for my taste
customer_reviews.text: So I had high hopes for this product since it's advertised as a low carb-low calorie protein supplement with a delicious chocolate flavor. Unfortunately, (much like my nursing program) it was unbearably salty and left a terrible taste in my mouth afterwards. I tried adding a banana to mask the flavor, extra almond milk, and even blending it with extra ice and nothing could mask the strong taste of saltiness in this shake. I very much wanted to like it, I'm not one to be picky or leave bad reviews, but this time I couldn't bear it. Glad I only got the small bag, I would've been pretty disappointed if I had spent the extra money on a larger portion.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Product not as high quality as before
customer_reviews.text: Product did not seem as quality as usual. You can see in this picture the differnce from the bottom of the glass and the new stuff on top. I have purchased Isopure many times and never have had any issues until now. Maybe I just recieved a bad batch, but makes me hesitant to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Finley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT. WOULDN'T CHANGE IT FOR ANYTHING.
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this product from the first zip. I take it before all my training​ as a breakfast and I could drink it every day because is like having my cafecito. It is not heavy on the stomach and easily dissolved in water.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA PATINO

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing flavor ... i dont like my protein to be hell of sweet and this protein hits right on the spot is a really soft so if you dont like that maybe look into something else. I always do water but today I did almond milk and you the taste is kinda salty. I will just stay with water for now. Also is really smooth on your stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: BOLLYWOOD STAR USE ISOPURE
customer_reviews.text: One of the best best and best product I’m personally using it from 5 months , I must say one of the best protein product Which has low carb . I tried few protein shake and protein powder but I was searching for literally no sugar in the protein powder and guys this is the one which literally which wanted . And I saw Varun Dhawan a Bollywood star using same iso pure protein powder . Highly highly recommended 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great results - Easy on the stomach
customer_reviews.text: So I have taken supplements for about 10 years now, and always had challenges finding a supplement that was easy on my stomach. Usually I would get gas or feel very bloated when I took protein supplements. I finally started using Isopure because I wanted to cut carbs in my protein source, and was fortunate to also get no gas/bloating in the process! Maybe my body changed, or maybe its the product, but whatever it is, I love this stuff and it taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Frank49

customer_reviews.title: Not the real stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my new container of Isopure, it had plastic around the top but did not have the white cover you have to peel away. Doesn't smell the same as my real container of Isopure. Will never buy this product from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dutch Chocolate - Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Something is terribly off with the taste of this mix lately, I think this will be my last purchase of the brand. It had a fishy musty taste and doesn't mix like it used to. I should have returned it, but, I just thought it was my tastebuds, but after several uses same bad taste I know it's not me.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa06

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy powder
customer_reviews.text: Bought the cookie and cream flavor. Everything looked fine until opened it. The plastic seat on the lid did not appear to be tampered with. However the inside seal was not glued onto the opening. As such the powder was clumpy and looked a little damp. It took longer to mix when I tried it the first time. Unfortunately I passed the 30 day return time since I had left overs from another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: Better than others; room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1 pound cookies and cream flavor. I wanted to try it out before committing to 3 pounds. I am also on the ketogenic diet. Overall, I liked it! Love the macros, 25g whey protein is great! I also like all the added nutrients! Taste is okay. Not shockingly amazing (however much better than others I have tried), and it's sweetened to my liking. Speaking of sweeteners, I really wish it was sweetened with erythritol or stevia. I'm not a fan of sucralose for the keto diet.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Meeeh...
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking ISOPURE protein powder for the last 10 years. I have change from different flavors from vanilla, cookies and cream, strawberry and chocolate and I have always being happy with it. There is something with this last protein powder that order did not satisfied me. I ordered the chocolate flavor and it tastes a somehow salty. I am not 100% happy with the protein and I am even now looking into trying other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: DISAPOINTED!!! ISO PURE should make the words Low carbs more noticeable for "0" users!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as I use their Vanilla and plain "0" carb and "love it"... So I decided to try the chocolate...so when I purchased this particular flavor I was tired after getting home from a long 10 hour day at work and didn't notice it said "low carb" have I wasted my hard earned money? Will this ruin my keto diet that I've been working so hard on?
customer_reviews.author: Not your Average Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Colombian coffee mixes well and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite protein powder in 10 years of training. The Colombian coffee flavor mixes very well even with a spoon in a cup. Tastes delicious if you love coffee and even looks delicious with swirls and even a little froth when mixed with water. I prefer mixing it with cold water. I’d like to note that I’ve tried the chocolate and vanilla flavors and I was not a fan of the taste or mixing ability compared to the Colombian coffee flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Gross. No flavor. Not sealed.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. It is bland and not properly sealed. I have purchased isopure before and love it, but this was awful. I can’t consume this, it has no flavor. Waste of my money. Don’t buy the mint chocolate chip or any low carb options. They are awful!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shops2much

product_meta.title: Isopure Zero Carb, Vitamin C and Zinc for Immune Support, 25g Protein, Keto Friendly Protein Powder, 100% Whey Protein Isolate, Flavor: Cookies & Cream, 3 Pounds (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Cookies & Cream| Size:3 Pound (Pack of 1)Pack in powerfully pure protein, without packing on the carbs. Our 100 percent whey protein isolate powders amp you up, without any unwanted weight. Just pick your level: Zero Carb or Low Carb (which also has ZERO sugar), both with 25 grams of protein per scoop. It's 100 percent whey protein isolate loaded with vitamins, minerals and nutrients to keep you going strong—and always without gluten, lactose, or any impurities. Made with our complete microfiltration process to be the only completely clear milk protein when dissolved in water. Available in a range of delicious flavors to mix up some seriously delicious and dynamic recipes.
feature_bullets: Vitamin C and Zinc Provides Immune Support along with Vitamin E
100% WHEY PROTEIN ISOLATE - a high-quality protein source providing 25g per serving to support muscle building and recovery
ZERO/LOW CARB OPTIONS- helps for those watching their calorie intakes
A PERFECT FIT - supports your active lifestyle and can be used post-workout, between meals, along with a healthy breakfast, or any time of day
KETO-FRIENDLY - this protein powder can help support your ketogenic macros

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
